endpoint.name: formular-test
endpoint.config: CREATE TABLE formulartest(id varchar(40), formular varchar(255), created timestamp, val0 varchar(255), val1 varchar(255), val2 varchar(255), val3 varchar(255), val4 varchar(255), val5 varchar(255), val6 varchar(255), val7 varchar(255));

datasource.name: formular-test
datasource.sql: insert into formulartest(id, formular, created, val0, val1, val2, val3, val4, val5, val6, val7) values( [string: sessionid], [string: formular], [timestamp: SystemTime()], [string: if IsDefined(val0) then val0 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val1) then val1 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val2) then val2 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val3) then val3 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val4) then val4 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val5) then val5 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val6) then val6 else null endif], [string: if IsDefined(val7) then val7 else null endif]);
